item.title: ds
item.description: Data Structure 相关概念 problem, algorithm, programming Def. Abstract Data Type (ADT, class) Data Structure Common data structures 1. 线性结构 Linear DS : Array, List (Stack, Queue) 3. 图 Graphs 4. 树 Tree 5. 关联表 hash tabless Proof Technoques 1.
